duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms, enterprise voice and video architecture, and modernization of cloud technology networks.
Develop the strategic IT plan to deliver voice and video services through consistent approaches and solutions across all lines of business.
Define and maintain all voice and video service’s key performance indicator (KPI) metrics and manage the design and approach to access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all services.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing, and deliver continuous improvement plans and programs to improve system availability and performance.

Collaborate with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives and participate in discussions with vendors and suppliers to resolve critical network issues and support implementation of new technologies.
Serve as a technical mentor for staff and communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders. Comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science) and 5 – 7 years of related experience, or equivalent experience acquired through accomplishments of applicable knowledge, duties, scope, and skill reflective of the level of this position.
